titleStmt.title: A Further and more perticular account of the cruel, desperate, and bloody fight and uproar that happen'd in Ireland on Monday the 6th of May 1700, between the weavers and butchers as also the great number of men that were wounded and kill'd on both sides, some having their heads, arms, backs and leggs broke in a cruel and terriable manner : with other dreadful circumstances that occasion'd it.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
